title: Reinstalling - Now Updating Incredibly Slow
body: I had to reinstall to try to fix client crashing issues. I uninstalled and got rid of the entire Riot Games folder. Now reinstalling and got to the update process. It is downloading 4,000MB+ of files at 50 Kbps. This will take a week. What is going on?

replies.body: It had long periods of very slow speeds. But eventually it downloaded at much higher speeds. The first 33% took forever though. Entire installation process was 4+ hours. Insane.

Every PC can very on how long it can take to install and update, especially based on things like your network or even how well your hard drive writes data.  Unless you're getting errors its' best to leave it alone and let it do its thing, otherwise you can delay it further.  Afterwards, you can try the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure that your network to our patching server is strong.  I hope that helps!
